title: Asian stocks up; Aussie rallies after rate hike
title_zh: 亚洲股市上涨；加息后澳元反弹
summary: By Tom Westbrook SINGAPORE, Feb 3 (Reuters) - Gold and Asian stocks were on the rebound on Tuesday as trade took a calmer tone after wild swings in metals markets, with the mood helped by a sharp jump
summary_zh: 路透新加坡 2 月 3 日 - 周二，黄金和亚洲股市出现反弹，金属市场剧烈波动后，交易情绪趋于平静，情绪大幅上涨，提振了市场情绪

title: Tesla introduces new Model Y variant in US priced at $41,990
title_zh: 特斯拉在美国推出新款 Model Y 车型，售价 41,990 美元
summary: Feb 2 (Reuters) - Electric-vehicle maker Tesla has introduced a new all-wheel drive variant of its bestselling Model Y SUV in the United States, priced at $41,990, according to the company's website
summary_zh: 路透 2 月 2 日 - 据该公司网站称，电动汽车制造商特斯拉在美国推出了其最畅销的 Model Y SUV 的全新全轮驱动版本，售价为 41,990 美元

title: TDK Shares Soar After Forecast Beat Outweighs Memory Price Fears
title_zh: 预测超出内存价格担忧后，TDK 股价飙升
summary: The company the previous day lifted its operating income outlook for the year ending March by 8% to ¥265 billion ($1.7 billion), ahead of the average of analyst estimates.
summary_zh: 该公司前一天将截至 3 月份的全年营业收入预期上调 8%，至 2,650 亿日元（17 亿美元），高于分析师平均预期。

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures climb as Wall Street looks to continue rally to start month
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克期货上涨，华尔街预计月初将继续上涨
summary: Futures markets climbed following a strong start to February trade.
summary_zh: 继二月份交易强劲开局后，期货市场攀升。

title: Musk confirms SpaceX merger with xAI ahead of IPO
title_zh: 马斯克确认 SpaceX 在 IPO 前与 xAI 合并
summary: SpaceX will merge with xAI in a deal that consolidates two of Elon Musk's biggest private startups.
summary_zh: SpaceX 将与 xAI 合并，该交易将整合埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 旗下两家最大的私人初创公司。

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq jump to kick off February as gold, silver, bitcoin remain volatile
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克指数二月份开局大涨，因黄金、白银、比特币仍然波动
summary: Wall Street is on edge after Friday's sharp reversal ahead of a week defined by Trump's Fed pick, jobs data, and more Big Tech earnings.
summary_zh: 在特朗普的美联储选择、就业数据和更多大型科技公司财报定义的一周之前，周五股市出现急剧逆转，华尔街陷入紧张状态。

title: AMD to report Q4 earnings amid AI spending concerns
title_zh: AMD 将公布第四季度财报，因人工智能支出令人担忧
summary: AMD will report its Q4 earnings after the bell on Tuesday.
summary_zh: AMD 将在周二盘后公布第四季度财报。

title: US and India reach trade deal, Astrazeneca shares move to NYSE
title_zh: 美国和印度达成贸易协议，阿斯利康股票登陆纽约证券交易所
summary: Yahoo Finance Host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including the US and India reaching a new trade deal, big-box retailers Target (TGT) and Walmart (WMT) both starting the month off with new chief executives at the...
summary_zh: 雅虎财经主持人乔什·利普顿 (Josh Lipton) 在本《市场分钟》中追踪今日走势最强劲的股票和最大的市场故事，包括美国和印度达成新的贸易协议、大型零售商塔吉特 (TGT) 和沃尔玛 (WMT) 都在本月开始任命新任首席执行官。

title: Why a SpaceX, xAI deal 'makes sense'
title_zh: 为什么 SpaceX 和 xAI 的交易“有意义”
summary: Tesla (TSLA) CEO Elon Musk is in talks to combine SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) with xAI (XAAI.PVT), according to reports.
summary_zh: 据报道，特斯拉 (TSLA) 首席执行官埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 正在就 SpaceX (SPAX.PVT) 与 xAI (XAAI.PVT) 的合并事宜进行谈判。
